meta.description: In this edition of SPOTM: Why are there so many celebrities draped in red? Why are so many of them hiding one eye? What was Rihanna trying to tell us? And why is there so much disturbing art in public spaces?

title: Symbolic Pics of the Month (02/23)
cleaned_text: In this edition of SPOTM: Why are there so many celebrities draped in red? Why are so many of them hiding one eye? What was Rihanna trying to tell us? And why is there so much disturbing art in public spaces?
